Prime Day Deals,Sales Today Clearance Prime Only,Lightning Deals Of Today Prime Clearance,Prime Day Deals

【Solar Power】The solar security camera features a rechargeable module battery, continuously charged by a solar panel for non stop power. Say goodbye to battery charging worries with this wireless and 2.4GHz WiFi enabled device. Easily mount it anywhere using the included screws and wall anchors.

【Smart person Detection & Alerts】Equipped with a built in PIR motion sensor, the WiFi security camera sends real time alerts upon motion detection. With person detection activated, it focuses on person, ensuring alerts when a person, not a pet or car is.
【Two Way Audio & Multi User Sharing】Stay connected with through real time audio from anywhere. access to the camera with family members for simultaneous remote viewing.
【1080P HD & Infrared Night Vision】Experience 1080p Full HD imagery and infrared night vision with the outdoor security camera. Monitor your home day and night, from any location.
【Encrypted Storage】Your footage is protected with encryption, ensuring its safe.
body.description: Product Name: WiFi CameraLens: 120 ° wide angle lensResolution: 1080P/20fpsInfrared light: dual filter automatic switching, 4 pc at 850nm Φ 28Mil high power infrared lampWiFi: 2.4G WiFi does not support 5GPIR: Human Shape and Bidirectional Speech IntercomLens: 120 ° wide angle lensNight vision: automatic filter switching, high power infrared light, night vision 6-8 metersBattery type: Rechargeable battery modulegrade: IP65Size:9x6cm/ 3.54*2.36inchGross weight:650g/ 1.43 lbInclude:1 x camera1 x Solar panel1 x Instruction manual2 x Stands1 x Charging Cable1 x Screw Pack
